If you need help, I lurk in in this discord https://discord.gg/GET4DVk : If you find a bug leave an issue on github.
 Warning: The crossquote can be very slow to respond especially when used cross server, give it time, it will give you an error if it isn't doing anything.
NAME: EmbedMaker
DESCRIPTION: You can use this to make embeds in channels (Which gives access to markdown syntax for links)
